channel.title: Please i really need help ive tried everything! please help!

item.title: Please i really need help ive tried everything! please help!
item.dc:creator: @iatchi1019 iatchi1019
item.description:
@iatchi1019 wrote:

ok so i made an item for my client and i wanted it to be a blue rune scim just all blue but it looked like a hammer thing in my inventory and looked like a zammy god sword when it was equipped this is my code

if(i == 19996){ //ice scim class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[3]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int [3]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 43968; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 43968; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 43968; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 43968; class8.anIntArray156[2] = 43968; class8.anIntArray160[2] = 43968; class8.anInt174 = 2731; class8.anInt181 = 1050; class8.anInt190 = 344; class8.anInt198 = 456; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 7207; class8.anInt200 = 7207; class8.anInt175 = 32; class8.anInt197 = 90; class8.aString170 = "Ice Scimitar"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Customized Ice Scimitar".getBytes(); }

can someone help me?
